item.description:
McGrath's is a fantastic friendly Saloon and Sports Bar right in the heart of Hyannis near the Cape Cod Airport Rotary.

McGrath's has an incredibly inexpensive menu !  For instance you can grab a sandwich for $8.00, and appetizers start at $3.50, burgers start at $7.00 and meals range from $10.00-$18.00!Check out their menu at www.http://mcgrathsaloon.com

In addition, Jack Leyde will be playing on guitar!  You will just love him! He sings songs that will bring you back to those teenage years! He's simply incredible.

 

NOTE:  McGraths is a small place, however, I was able to set up a second seating area for those on the waitlist so they can be included! We need to be were the entertainment is! Whoo Hoo!

NOTE: 

This is a small venue. In light of illnesses and emergencies, if you are not planning on attending cancel now.  I will not appreciate "No Shows"
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing my Girl's Just Wanna Have Fun Pin!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner & Entertainment at McGrath's Saloon and Sports Bar!
